    • Method Detail

      • resume

        public static void resume(@Nullable
                          android.content.Intent intent)
        Finalizes authentication flows by calling latest Login/Logout Manager with results coming from AuthenticationActivity. Objects are difficult to pass between activities which is the reason this method is used.
        Parameters:
        intent - intent from auth activity

      • setManager

        public static void setManager(ResumableManager manager)
        Setter for manager to be used after authorization flows.
        Parameters:
        manager - resumable manage

      • isLoggingEnabled

        public boolean isLoggingEnabled()
        Checks if logging for library is enabled
        Returns:
        whether logging for library is enabled

      • setLoggingEnabled

        public void setLoggingEnabled(boolean loggingEnabled)
        Setter for enabling logging for library. Do not enable logging in production as it logs http bodies including auth tokens.
        Parameters:
        loggingEnabled - whether logging should be enabled

      • getDomainUrl

        public okhttp3.HttpUrl getDomainUrl()
        Getter for domain url.
        Returns:
        HttpUrl of domain url
